about_the_game:
Embark on an action-packed, retro-inspired adventure in "Prince Zian: Rescue Mission," a thrilling platform game meticulously crafted by a talented indie developer. Join Prince Zian and his courageous companions as they journey to save Exolotl Planet from the ruthless invasion led by King Orion, who has abducted Zian's father, the king of Exolotl.



Immerse yourself in a captivating world filled with nostalgic pixel art, reminiscent of classic retro games. Take control of five unique characters, each equipped with their own arsenal of abilities and weapons. Switch between characters on the fly, strategically utilizing their strengths to overcome challenges and defeat a variety of enemies throughout the exhilarating levels.
[/i]


Prepare to traverse diverse environments such as dense jungles, sun-soaked beaches, mystical underwater realms, grimy sewers, futuristic cyberpunk cities, and sinister laboratories, all meticulously designed to deliver an authentic retro experience. Engage in fast-paced action as you battle against alien creatures, mutants, robots, and more, in your quest to restore peace to Exolotl Planet.

Experience a captivating storyline that unfolds through immersive cut scenes, taking you on a thrilling journey across 12+ levels. Test your skills against formidable bosses in 8 epic battles that will push you to your limits. Along the way, don't forget to save the adorable Axolotl babies, adding an extra layer of challenge and fulfillment to your heroic mission.

With its action-packed gameplay, retro visuals, and engaging storyline, "Prince Zian: Rescue Mission" promises an exciting and nostalgic gaming experience. Are you ready to take up the challenge and become the hero Exolotl needs? Download "Prince Zian: Rescue Mission" now and embark on an unforgettable retro adventure to save Exolotl Planet!

Your mission? SAVE EXOLOTL PLANET AND THE KING!

REVIEWER :


FEATURES :
- 5 SWITCHING CHARACTERS IN DIFFERENT MOVE AND ABILITY
- SAVE THE AXOLOTL BABIES EACH LEVEL
- CUT SCENE STORIES 12+ EXOCTIC LEVEL AND 8 UNIQUE BOSSES
- A LOT OF ENEMIES SUCH AS : ALIENS, MUTANTS, ROBOTS, ETC
- LEVEL THEME JUNGLE, BEACH, UNDER THE SEA, SEWER, CYBERPUNK CITY, LABORATORY
- SAVE EXOLOTL PLANET AND THE KING!

name: Exolotl : ZIAN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 8
  • Processor: intel core i3 @3.2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic Card with Dx9
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic Card nvidia
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Zian the Exolotl need to save their planet from King Orion invasion Platform game adventure with 5 Exolotl Character which can be switch character, youcan use it in each different level with special moving and ability including SWORD, BOXING, MAGIC, GUNNER, EVEN THROWING TOYS !!
